alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Gurabo; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 04 at 10:58PM ADT until October 05 at 1:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Ceiba, Fajardo, Gurabo, Humacao, Juncos, Las Piedras and Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 100 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Mudslides are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 957 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Ceiba; Fajardo; Gurabo; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Naguabo
